Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 83rd overall pick, by Pontiac in 1976...
Injured on 6/2/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1982, off Adrian Montoya (WT)...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Hit first career homerun on 7/10/1984, off Wilbert Boehmer (CI)...
Injured on 6/4/1987 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 3/1/1988 to a minor league contract.
